contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Qatar MICE Development Institute Announces Its Line-up of Activities for Commercial Bank Qatar Masters 2015 Golf Tournament

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar MICE Development Institute (QMDI), a joint venture with Qatar Foundation (QF), has announced its line-up of activities for the upcoming Commercial Bank Qatar Masters 2015 as part of its Gold Sponsorship.

As one of the most prestigious annual sporting events in Qatar and part of the esteemed European Tour, the tournament is hosted at Doha Golf Club from January 21 – 24 and offers a $2.5 million prize fund that attracts some of the sport’s leading names.

As well as playing an integral role in executing the event that hosts international golf stars and thousands of local visitors, QMDI will be offering fans and guests a range of activities, including a bespoke stand in the Public Pavilion and branded VIP chalet.

Activities include family friendly opportunities to win prizes and meet and greets with touring players including PGA Golf Professionals Mark Reynolds, Henrik Stenson, Marcel Siem and Thorbjrn Olesen. QMDI will organize competitions such as ‘Ball-Catcher’ where participants will test their reflexes in the cage to see how many balloons they can catch, or ‘Reaction Wall’ that tasks players to hit as many lights in 30 seconds.

QMDI will also pay special attention to the youngest visitors offering them entertainment with a balloon artist as well as the opportunity to explore their creativity in the coloring area. In partnership with QF Radio QMDI will also organize competitions offering fans free tickets to the Commercial Bank Qatar Masters 2015.

For the full story, please click here.
